editorialNotes.standard: Incredibly powerful yet easy to use, uMake is simply a fantastic 3D sketching app. An intuitive interface and smart tutorials help you jump right in and start crafting highly detailed designs. Import reference photos, use live symmetry to draw quickly and edit and export your work in a flash. Built to take full advantage of the iPad (and especially iPad Pro and Apple Pencil), itâs a perfect way to create professional-quality designs wherever you are.
